Articles.Content: Ever since the update, I've noticed a few glitches. Instead of getting reentry effects, my craft just turns purple. Also, small bodies in the game turn pitch black when I get close to the surface. I've noticed this on Minmus, Ike, and Gilly. However, Kerbin, the Mun, Duna, and Eve all keep their regular textures. I've updated my drivers and am not sure where to go from here.
